CustomField.description: When checked, users gain the ability to populate a blank value for the Resource__c field on Milestone_Task__c. Leave this unchecked if using Auto_Resource_Assignment__c.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: When checked, users gain the ability to populate a blank value for the Resource__c field on Milestone_Task__c. Leave this unchecked if using Auto_Resource_Assignment__c.
CustomField.label: Allow Blank Resource on Milestone Task
